caption.title: Bacterial superglue-based VHH formatting.
caption.p: ( A) SDS-PAGE of ELP-based scaffolds with an N-terminal SnoopCatcher and a C-terminal SpyCatcher domain. ( B) SDS-PAGE of RVFV and ( C) SBV-specific VHHs expressed with a C-terminal Snooptag or Spytag. The untagged variants were expressed with the llama antibody long hinge region. ( D) Illustration of the bacterial superglue-based site-directed formation of a bispecific or bivalent VHH complex. ( E) SDS-PAGE of the bacterial superglue-based formation of bivalent and bispecific VHH complexes using ELPs of various length. VHH RV115 and VHH RV150 were used as an example for VHH-A and VHH-B, respectively.
